byline.contributor: Maggie Haberman and Jonathan Martin contributed reporting.
byline.original: By JENNIFER STEINHAUER and MATT FLEGENHEIMER

abstract: Political Memo; Sen Ted Cruz has sought to redefine his image beyond his failed presidential bid by refusing to back Donald J Trump at Republican National Convention, but has drawn ire of delegates who demand that he throw his support behind Trump; uproar may complicate Cruz's future ambitions.

headline.print_headline: Cruz Gambled on Redefining 2020 Race, but Critics See Betrayal
headline.main: Ted Cruz Mounts the Convention Stage in the Role of Brutus

snippet: Mr. Cruz used his speech not to endorse the nominee but to position himself for the future....
lead_paragraph: Mr. Cruz used his speech not to endorse the nominee but to position himself for the future.
